p: The Pearson and Spearman’s rank correlation coefficients (PCC and SCC, respectively) were calculated to estimate the correlation between HCV prevalence in the general population of each country and in populations with LRDs of each country. P < 0.05 was considered to provide strong evidence for an association. HCV prevalence in the general population of each country was provided through meta‐analyses of prevalence in each MENA country. 8, 9, 10, 16, 17, 18, 19, 20, 21 Statistical analyses were performed using STATA 13. 39
